messages.subject: Rue and Ren
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/9/2003 11:52:19 AM Central Daylight Time, ... LOL!! I m laughing out loud thank you....:) It was two kids and Jalen was climbing and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/2003 11:52:19 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> I would like to see Ren.
> I have a fuzzy vision of her sitting in the hospital room, by the window,
> with I don't even remember now one or two kids. Either two and one was
> climbing,
> or one and who was climbing up and down and around.
>
> I'm not on painkillers anymore and would kind like to meet Ren standing
> upright.


LOL!! I'm laughing out loud thank you....:)

It was two kids and Jalen was climbing and grabbing the camera as I was
trying to take a picture of you and you said I was being patient with him, which
totally made me feel great! It wasn't easy with a busy toddler.
Another time I came with just Marty...that was much calmer. But I think more
drug induced.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Rue and Ren
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/9/2003 12:15:09 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Sorry Kelly, I m waiting on my sister and her dh s bonus!! I really, truly can t afford the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/2003 12:15:09 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Kelly, still waiting to hear from Ren!


Sorry Kelly, I'm waiting on my sister and her dh's bonus!! I really, truly
can't afford the conference this year due to the work being done on my teeth (no
insurance and lots of money going out) BUT, my sis's dh might get a really
large bonus and she is willing to help us get up there if it all works out.
So we should know in a couple more weeks.
Hope for my bil to get a LOT!! :) hehe I adore my sweet sister. Hopefully
we'll both be there with SEVEN kids between the two of us.

She's almost an unschooler....still does math workbooks once in a while.
BUT, she's let up on tv, video games and the whole religion issues. Cool.

Ren
